attributes.action: give garry raybould manager of ozzypowered fc the england managers job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lets get some one in who is street wise and see,s it how it is.Mcclaren and venables look like two street sellers knocking out dodgy watches.Garry is everything england needs please back him on his campain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
